answers.answer: thank you for making a new post :)did any of your test results come back yet? if not, give them a call and ask if you haven't heard from them. the only medication that is effective for gonorrhea currently is IM ceftriaxone. In otherwords if no one gave you a shot in the butt, you weren't treated properly but first make sure what it is that is going on so you aren't treated needlessly.nothing sounds like herpes so far.grace
Thank u grace ill get bk to u .no reslults r in im jus worried because ive heard 1 n 5 people have herpes
herpes isn't going to cause a white discharge. of course you can be infected with more than 1 thing at a time too.

Results came back neg was referred to another dr they believe the white discharge is yeast from high blood suger levels from my diabetes . And the itch is from razor burn due shaving my area lol will keep u informed if anything new comes up.

question: im wondering if i have herpes had a urinalysis a few days ago which they sent off to be tested for ghonoreah .i was written scripts for chlymidia and trichomona the 1st script was four pills onetime. And the second was doxycycline twice a day for seven days.i started the scripts sunday morning its now tuesday afternoon and m still leaking . I have a slight itching in my ball area and a occasional pain in the head of my penis on the bottom side. And i also have a white discharge which was the first indication of infection. What could this be ? im really nervous and test results wont b back for a week .
title: does it sound like herpes
